MIDDLE EASTERN WRAP 🤩 The popular tortilla hack with an exciting twist! 😋

This tortilla is filled with hummus, fried eggplant, veggies and chickpeas... the combination of gods! 😍
It’s super healthy, easy to make, perfect to prep, I’m sure you’re gonna love it (even my brother liked it heh) 🤗

I used an Arabic wrap for this recipe but any wrap will work, also if you wanna make it “sabich style” you can use kala namak instead of normal salt. 😇
Much love
Maya ✨
RECIPE (2 servings each 540cal/21P/66C/13F):

-1 eggplant
-1 Tsp salt
-1 Tbsp olive oil (for frying)
Chickpeas:
-1 can (220g) chickpeas
-1 Tsp salt
Else:
-2 wraps
-2 Tbsp hummus
-fresh veggies
-tahini 
RUB the eggplant with the salt and set aside/SALT the chickpeas and bake at 175Celsius/350 Fahrenheit for 15min/FRY the eggplant 5-7min/FILL the wrap
Try it yourself and tag me with @fitgreenmind 😇

RECIPE (3 apples each 260cal/7P/34C/8F):

-1 Tbsp (15g) maple syrup
-1 Tbsp (15g) almond butter
Vanille Sauce:

-1 Tbsp vanilla pudding powder 
Deseed the apples and mix up the filling/Fill the apples and bake them 180 Celsius/360 Fahrenheit for 25-30min/Heat up the plant milk and stir in the pudding powder

HOMEMADE CROQUETTES 😍 Simple to make and better than store bought! 😇

RECIPE (5 servings each 255cal/7P/50C/1F):

BOIL the potatoes until soft/MASH them with the remaining ingredients/COAT them in breadcrumbs (you might have to cost them in plant milk first that the breadcrumbs don’t fall off)/ BAKE at 175 Celsius/350 Fahrenheit for 30-35min

VEGAN „TURKEY“ ROAST 🎄🤩 This gotta be your Christmas dinner! 😜

This vegan roast is nice tender and super flavoursome, the perfect highlight of a vegan Xmas dinner! 😋

Btw the „turkey“ shape is more kinda like a joke, the roast will taste just as good if shaped differently!😇
All the best
Maya 😇
RECIPE (9 slices each 125cal/15P/9C/9F):
Liquid:
-1 can (220g) chickpeas
-1 cup (250ml) vegetable cup 
-2 Tsp poultry seasoning 
-2 TBSP nutritional yeast 
-salt to taste
-2 Tsp soy sauce
-1/4 Tsp garlic powder 
Dry:
-1 1/3 cup (165g) vital wheat gluten
Marinade:
-3 Tbsp bbq sauce
1.Blend the liquid ingredients for 30sec and mix it with the vital wheat gluten.
2.Process the dough 4-5min
3.Wrap the roast tightly and steam it for 1 hour.
4.Brush the roast with the bbq sauce and bake at 180 Celsius/360 Fahrenheit for 25min.
Try it yourself and tag me with @fitgreenmind
-
VEGANER BRATEN🎄🤩 Dieser Braten darf bei deinem Weihnachtsessen nicht fehlen! 😋

Er hat die perfekte Konsistenz, schmeckt super lecker und ist das perfekte Weihnachtshighlight! 😇

Übrigens die „Truthahn-Form“ ist eher als eine Art Witz gedacht und der Braten schmeckt in einer anderen Form genauso gut! 😜
Alles liebe
Maya😇
REZEPT (9 Scheiben je 125kcal/15P/9K/9F):
Nass:
-1 Dose (220g) Kichererbsen
-250ml Gemüsebrühe
-2 Tl Brathähnchengewürz
-2 El Hefeflocken
-2 Tl Soja Sauce 
-eine Prise Salz
-1/4 Tl Knoblauchpulver
Trocken:
-165g Seitan Fix
Marinade:
-3 El Bbq Sauce
1.Zerkleinere die nassen Zutaten für 30-60sek und vermische sie mit den Seitan Fix.
2.Zerkleinere den Teig für 4-5min und wickle ihn eng ein.
3.Dämpfe ihn für 1h und bestreiche ihn mit der Bbq Sauce.
4.Backe ihn bei 180 Grad für 25min.
Probiere ihn selbst aus und tagge mich mit @fitgreenmind

-salt to taste
ROAST the squashes at 200 Celsius/400 Fahrenheit for 30-40 minutes/MIX up the corn starch with 1/4 cup of the milk/BRING the remaining ingredients to a boil and stir in the corn starch until thickened/FILL the sauce in the squashes and bake for 10-15min

VEGAN SPECULOOS “TIRAMISU” 😍 My new favourite Christmas dessert! 😇

RECIPE (30 Nussecken each 215cal/5P/15C/15F):
Crust:
-2 1/2 cups (300g) flour (I took spelt flour)
-1 Tsp baking powder 
-1/2 cup (150g) maple syrup (or any other sweetener)
-1 Tsp vanilla extract 
-1/2 cup (125g) nut butter (or margarine)
Nut layer:
-3 cups (400g) ground almonds
-3/4 cup + 2 Tbsp (200g) margarine
-1/2 cup (150g) maple syrup (or any other sweetener)
-1 Tsp vanilla extract 
Optional:
-vegan chocolate 
MIX AN KNEAD the crust/ROLL it out thinly/WHISK up the nut layer/SPREAD it equally on the crust/BAKE at 150 Celsius/300 Fahrenheit for 20-30minutes/ CUT when still hot
Try them yourself and tag me with @fitgreenmind 🥸

PEANUT SESAME BAKED TOFU 🥜 This is one of my favourite dinners ever! 😍

I’ve seen this „lettuce cup“ at @maxlamanna and I was immediately inspired to make my own version! 🥰
The tofu has a nice bite and a „meaty“ texture because it‘s baked, the satay sauce is beautifully creamy and nutty and the lettuce and carrots add a fresh kick! 😋🙌

I served everything with more peanut sauce and sriracha, noodles would be great addition for sure! 🤗

-1 Tbsp soy sauce
-a handful fresh cilantro
-a drizzle maple syrup and sesame (for topping)

RECIPE (2 servings each 180cal/2P/26C/7F):

-1 Tbsp olive oil
-1 Tsp smoked paprika
-1 Tsp garlic powder
-1 Tsp mustard
-1/2 Tsp cumin
-salt to taste
-4 Tbsp BBQ sauce
Add a splash of water and roast the jackfruit + seasoning  for 10min/add BBQ sauce roast for 5min

RECIPE (14 brownies each 110cal/10P/17C/3F):

-1/2 cup (150g) maple syrup
-3/4 cup (90g) flour (all purpose, whole wheat, spelt and oat flour will work)
-1/2 cup (60g) cocoa powder 
-1 Tsp baking powder 
-1/4 cup (60ml) plant milk
-more chocolate chunks
BAKE at 180 Celsius/360 Fahrenheit for 25 minutes

SPICY TOFURGER 🍔 Them: VeGaN FooD Is BoRinG! Me: Hold my Tofurger!

This burger is honestly the best vegan burger I'VE EVER MADE! It's got that nice bite, the perfect texture it's super flavorsome and also packed with protein... 😍🙌

BTW here's a pro tip: press your tofu for 30-60minutes before using, so the patties will have the best texture! ☺️👌

Definitely try this burger very soon and you can also change the recipe by using the spices of your choice... 😋
Much love
Maya🥳
INGREDIENTS (4 patties each 165cal/15P/10C/7F):
-2 blocks (400g) extra firm tofu
-2 Tbsp tomato paste
-1 Tbsp sriracha
-1 Tsp salt
-1 Tsp dried parsley
-1/2 Tsp dried basil
-1 Tsp curry powder
-1 diced onion
-5 Tbsp all purpose flour
(bsje at 175 Celsius/350 Fahrenheit for 25-30 minutes and flip halfway through)
Try them yourself and tag me with @fitgreenmind 👀
-
WÜRZIGER TOFURGER🍔 Sie: VeGanEs EssEn IsT LanGWeiLiG! Ich: Halt meinen Tofurger!

Das ist ungelogen der beste Bürger, den ich JE gemacht habe!
Er hat die perfekte Textur, er ist schön würzig und enthält sogar viel Protein... 😍🙌

Und hier ein kleiner Pro-Tipp: Presse den Tofu für 30-60min bevor du ihn benutzt, so bekommen die Patties die beste Konsistenz! ☺️👌

Probiere diesen Burger unbedingt bald aus und du kannst ihn auch ganz nach deinem Geschmack abändern, indem du die Gewürze austauschst ... 😋
Alles liebe
Maya🥳
ZUTATEN (4 Patties je 165kcal/15P/10K/7F):
-400g Tofu
-20g Tomatenmark
-15g Sriracha
-1 TL Salz
-1 TL getr. Petersilie
-1/2 TL getr. Basilikum
-1 klein geschnittene Zwiebel
-50g Mehl
(backe sie bei 175 Grad für 25-30 Minuten und drehe sie nach der Hälfte um)

BAKED APPLE CAKE🍎🎂 STOP!
YOU GOTTA REMAKE THIS CAKE! ✋

It's so ridiculously easy to make with a few healthy ingredients... NO REFINED SUGAR, NO OIL!

INGREDIENTS (10 pieces each 180cal/5P/31C/4F):
Cake:
-1/3 cup (110g) maple syrup
-1 Tsp vanilla extract
-1/4 cup (60g) nut butter
-3/4 cup + 2 Tbsp (200ml) plant milk
-2 cups (250g) flour of your choice
-2 Tsp baking powder
Pudding layer:
-1/2 cup (125g) vegan vanilla yogurt 
-2 Tbsp corn starch 
-1/2 Tsp cinnamon 
Caramel:
-2 Tbsp peanut butter
-4 Tbsp maple syrup
(bake at 175 Celsius/350 Fahrenheit for 35-40 minutes)

APPLE STREUSEL CAKE🍎🎂 This is THE BEST cake I've ever made according to my mom! 👀

INGREDIENTS (10 pieces each 250cal/8P/36C/7F):
Cake:
-1/3 cup (110g) maple syrup
-1/4 cup (60g) nut butter
-1 Tsp vanilla extract

Streusel:

-1/4 cup (60g) nut butter
-4 Tbsp maple syrup
-1 Tsp cinnamon
Else:
-1 apple
(bake at 175 Celsius /350 Fahrenheit for 35-40 minutes but cover it to prevent the Streusel from burning)

ZUTATEN (10 Stücke je 165kcal/5P/25K/4F):
-2 Bananen
-3 El Ahornsirup
-1 EL Nussmus
-200ml Pflanzendrink
-215g Mehl
-1 TL Zimt 
-2 TL Backpulver 
Streusel:
-65g Mehl
-3 El Ahornsirup
-3 El Nussmus
-1 TL Zimt
(backe es bei 180 Grad für 60-70 Minuten und gedeckte die Streusel, dass sie nicht anbrennen)

SPEEDY SPAG BOL 🍝 I bet you can't make a quicker spag bol than this! 👀

You want a meaty and hearty vegan bolognese but you don't want to spend hours in the kitchen?
Then this recipe is perfect for you!👊
This spag bol is made in 15 minutes, it's super flavorsome and the perfect comfort food  on weekdays! 😍

The best thing, it's even healthy and you WON'T NEED FANCY INGREDIENTS to make it!
So grab your cooking spoon and let's go! 😋
Much love
Maya☺️
INGREDIENTS (5 servings each 405cal/23P/51C/11F):
-1 onion
-2 medium carrots
-1 Tbsp tomato paste
-1 block (400g) extra firm tofu
-2 Tbsp balsamic vinegar
-2 Tbsp soy sauce
-3 cups (750ml) passata
-a pinch of salt and pepper
-2 Tsp Italian herbs
-1 Tsp paprika
-pasta for 5
Try it yourself and tag me with @fitgreenmind 👀
-

HEALTHY APPLE CARAMEL BLONDIES🍎🎂 STOP!
YOU GOTTA REMAKE THIS CAKE! ✋

It's so ridiculously easy to make with a few healthy ingredients... NO REFINED SUGAR, NO OIL!
And it taste just heavenly good! 🙌
It's perfectly gooey and moist, sweet with a lovely touch of vanilla and the caramel sauce makes these blondies a banger! 😍

Also these blondies give you some cosy fall vibes, you know that sweater-feeling, drinking a cup of warm tea and relaxing covered in a cosy blanket! 🍂
Much love
Maya🍀
INGREDIENTS (10 pieces each 180cal/5P/31C/4F):
Blondies:
-1/3 cup (110g) maple syrup
-1 Tsp vanilla extract
-1/4 cup (60g) nut butter
-3/4 cup + 2 Tbsp (200ml) plant milk
-2 cups (250g) flour of your choice
-2 Tsp baking powder
-2 small apples
Caramel:
-2 Tbsp peanut butter
-4 Tbsp maple syrup
(bake at 175 Celsius/350 Fahrenheit for 20-25 minutes)
Try it yourself and tag me with @fitgreenmind 👀
-
GESUNDE APFEL KARAMELL BLONDIES 🍎🎂 DU MUSST DIESEN KUCHEN UNBEDINGT AUSPROBIEREN! ✋

DIESE Blondies sind so unglaublich einfach mit ein paar gesunden Zutaten gemacht... KEIN ZUCKER KEIN ÖL!

Maya🍀
ZUTATEN (10 Stücke je 180kcal/5P/31K/4F):
Blondies:
-110g Ahornsirup
-60g Nussmus
-1 TL Vanille Extrakt
-200ml Pflanzendrink
-250g Mehl deiner Wahl
-2 TL Backpulver
-2 kleine Äpfel
Karamell:
-2 El Erdnussmus
-4 El Ahornsirup
(backe sie bei 175 Grad für 20-25 Minuten)

BAKE AT 175/350 FOR 20-25 MINUTES

CREAMY CHOCOLATE PUDDING🍫🍦 This healthy chocolate pudding will blow your socks off! 😏

It's is so creamy, silky, smooth, it's perfectly sweet and has a lovely rich chocolate flavor! 😍
I can't believe that such a delicious treat id REFINED SUGAR FREE, OIL FREE needs NO TOFU, NO AVOCADO and NO NUTS! 🙌

Trust me, this is probably the best and easiest chocolate pudding ever!
It's absolutely foolproof and you can either eat it right away or refrigerate for 30 minutes! 😊

Definitely try this chocolate pudding or you'll muss out! 😏

INGREDIENTS (6 servings each 250cal/3P/26C/14F):

-1/3 cup maple syrup

-1 Tsp vanilla extract 
(refrigerate for 1 hour)

They're inspired by Mars bars, so there's this gooey, sweet caramel on the creamy vanilla ice cream and everything is covered in chocolate.. It's a win, right? 😍🙌

I think these bites are the perfect summer treat, they're cooling, sweet and on top of that refined-sugar-free and oil-free! 🤗
So, definitely give them a go and convince yourself... 😁
Much love
Maya💚
INGREDIENTS (12 bites each 115cal/2P/11C/6F):
Ice cream:
-2 frozen bananas
-3 Tbsp peanut butter
-2 Tbsp plant milk
-1 Tsp vanilla extract
Caramel:
-3 Tbsp peanut butter
-1/8 cup maple syrup
-a pinch of salt
-1 Tsp plant milk
Else:
-100g melted vegan chocolate
(freeze at least 3 hours before covering in chocolate)
Try them yourself and rag me with #fitgreenrecipes 💚
-
GESUNDER EISKONFEKT🍦🍫 Wer will einen Bissen... Oder zwei? 👇😉

Dieser Eiskonfekt ist mehr als lecker und inspiriert von Mars Riegeln.
Also ist eine süße Karamell-Schicht auf dem cremigen Vanilleeis und alles ist umhüllt von knackiger Schokolade... Einfach lecker! 😍🙌

Die hier sind definitiv perfekt für den Sommer, denn sie sind schön kühl, süß und sogar zuckerfrei und ölfrei! 🤗
Also, probiere sie unbedingt selbst aus und überzeuge dich selbst. 😁
Maya💚
ZUTATEN (12 Bites je 115kcal/2P/11K/6F):
Eis:
-2 gefrorene Bananen
-3 El Erdnussmus
-1 TL Vanille Extrakt
-2 El Pflanzendrink
Karamell:
-3 El Erdnussmus
-35g Ahornsirup
-eine Prise Salz
-1 TL Pflanzendrink
Sonst:
-100g geschmolzene vegane Schokolade
(friere Sie für min 3 Stunden bevor Du sie mit Schokolade überziehst)
Probiere sie selbst aus und tagged mich mit dem #fitgreenrecipes 💚

NO BAKE COSMIC BROWNIES🍫🌠 These brownies look... 👇😍

I'd say they look and taste droolicious!
They're soft, they're fudgy, they're chocolatey, they're sweet and the chocolate ganache on top literally melts in your mouth!😍
On top of that you don't need a food processor for making these delicious treats and they're made within minutes! 🙌

BTW you can save 10% with 'Maya10' on your order. 😊

Maya💚
INGREDIENTS (10 brownies each 196cal/6P/19C/10F):
Brownies:
-1/2 cup peanut butter
-1/3 cup maple syrup
-1 Tsp vanilla extract
-a pinch of salt
-1/4 cup protein powder
-1/2 cup oat flour
-7 Tbsp cocoa powder
Ganache:
-2 Tbsp melted coconut oil
-3 Tbsp cocoa powder
-3 Tbsp maple syrup
(refrigerate 30 minutes)
Try them yourself and tag me with #fitgreenrecipes 💚

SALTED CASHEW FUDGE🍪 This. Is. The. Best. Treat. Ever!

This fudge is incredible!
It's not only OIL-FREE and REFINED-SUGAR, it's even super easy to make!

The slightly salted cashews add a beautiful crunch to the soft and sweet fudge and if you eat it straight from the freezer the bites kinda melt in your mouth!
So, the perfect summer treat! 😍🙌

This is probably the healthiest and easiest fudge ever, so definitely try it! 😋
What's actually your favorite treat, lemme know in the comments! 👇🥰
Much love
Maya💚
INGREDIENTS (9 pieces each 145cal/6P/10C/8F):
-1/2 cup peanut butter
-1/4 cup maple syrup
-a pinch of salt
-1/4 protein powder by @nutritionplus.de
-1/3 cup roasted cashews
(freeze for 1 hour)
Try it yourself and tag me with #fitgreenrecipes 💚

And not only that, it's also way cheaper and healthier to make these bars at home instead of buying them.
And trust me it literally takes just a couple minutes and you're done.

So, I would say that these bars are a perfect high protein snack as well as a nice healthy treat bc they're so incredibly delicious.

You better make them soon! 😉
Much love
Maya💚

ALMOND JOY MOUSSE 🍦🍫 Look at this fluffy mouthful of goodness!

We've got an amazing combination with the creany nutty almond butter, the sweet maple syrup and the touch of coconut all together as a light and fluffy mousse. 
I absolutely love aquafaba (chickpea water) to make desserts like this.
But if you struggle with getting it stiff, add a pinch of salt before whisking. 
Another great thing about this mousse is that the preparation only takes a couple minutes and a few hours later you've got an incredible vegan dessert. 
And it's even sugar-free, so what do you want more?! Nevertheless this almond joy mousse is honestly pure joy and perfect to impress your friends or family. 😉
Much love 
Maya💚
INGREDIENTS:
-1/2 cup almond butter
-3 Tbsp coconut cream
-3 Tbsp maple syrup
-a pinch of salt - aquafaba of one can chickpeas (chickpea water) *(refrigerate for at least 2 hours)* Try it yourself and tag me with #fitgreenrecipes 💚
-
PERFEKTES MANDEL MOUSSE🍦🍫 Schaut euch diese fluffige Schönheit an! 
Wir haben hier eine perfekte Kombination aus cremig, nussigem Mandelmus, süßem Ahornsirup, ein Hauch Kokos und alles als fluffige Mousse verpackt. 
Ich arbeite total gerne mit Aquafaba (Kichererbsen Wasser), um solche Desserts zu machen. 
Aber falls du Probleme damit hast es fest zu bekommen, probiere es mal mit einer Prise Salz. 
Was dieses Mousse noch besser macht ist, dass die Zubereitung super schnell und einfach ist u d nach ein paar Stunden im Kühlschrank hat man ein mega leckeres Dessert. 
Und es kommt sogar ganz ohne Zucker aus, was will man mehr?! Also dieses Mousse ist wirklich fantastisch und auch perfekt, um deine Freunde oder Familie zu beeindrucken! 😉
Maya💚

-125g Mandelmus
-3 El Ahornsirup -3 El Kokoscreme (das obere einer Dose Kokosmilch) -eine Prise Salz -Aquafaba (Kichererbsenwasser einer Dose Kichererbsen) (kühle es für mindestens zwei Stunden)

Meiner Meinung nach ist es schon fast wie purer Nutella im Glas, aber viel gesünder. 
Wie die meisten meiner Rezepte, ist dieses Mousse auch aus einfachen und gesunden Zutaten und enthält keinen Zucker. 
Also verwöhne Deine Seele und deinen Körper! 
Übrigens, je lecker es im Tiefkühler ist, desto fester wird es, ich empfehle es für ca. eine. Stunde ins Gefrierfach zu stellen und danach bis zum Verzehr im Kühlschrank aufzubewahren. 
Maya💚
ZUTATEN :
-6 Datteln
-250ml vollfett Kokosmilch
-1 El Backkakao -1 El Erdnussbutter -1 TL Vanille Extrakt

The ice cream got this phenomenal unique soft serve texture and nutty peanut butter plus crunchy Choc chips is always a win.

Surprise, surprise, you don't need a fancy ice cream machine to make this,
a blender, food processor or even a good stick blender work.

BTW for the perfect texture, let the ice cream melt a tiny bit after you've taken it out of the freezer.
So the soft serve is perfect creamy and amazing for a relaxed evening on the sofa.
Much love
Maya💚
INGREDIENTS:
-about 450g frozen bananas
-1/4 cup peanut butter
-1/2 cup plant milk
-1/3 cup chocolate chips

Try it yourself and tag me with #fitgreenrecipes 💚
-
CREMIGES ERDNUSS SOFTEIS🥜🍦 Was ist besser als Erdnuss Softeis? Genau, gesundes und veganes Softeis!

Wenn ich das Video sehe, bekomme ich gerade wieder Lust drauf.
Das Eis hat diese fantastische Softeis Konsistenz und nussig Erdnussbutter mit knackiger Schokolade ist immer gut.

Überraschung, du brauchst keine Eismaschine, um das Eis zu machen.
Ein Standmixer, Food processor oder sogar ein guter Stabmixer reichen aus.

Übrigens lasse das Eis nachdem du es aus dem Gefrierschrank genommen hast kurz abkühlen, um die perfekte Konsistenz zu erreichen.
Dann ist es super cremig und wie gemacht für einen entspannten Abend auf der Couch.
Maya💚
ZUTATEN :
-ca. 450g gefrorene Bananen
-125ml Pflanzenmilch
-70g Erdnussmus
-65g Schokochips

Probiere es selbst aus und tagge mich mit dem #fitgreenrecipes 💚. Music by @djquads

HEALTHY OOEY GOOEY BLONDIES🍫🍪 A dozen of these and I'm happy!

These blondies are honestly amazing, as I've said 'ooey gooey' in the center and they've got a nice little crisp on the outside.

Trust me, you won't believe that they're refined sugar- and oil-free,
and I bet that no one would've guessed the secret ingredient!

Bring them to a birthday party and every one will love them.
BTW for a gluten free version you can sub the flour to almond flour.

VEGAN MAC 'N' CHEESE🧀 Look at this creamy, nutrient packed pasta!

And when I say creamy, I mean super super creamy and rich in flavor.
Even though the sauce is made of really simple ingredients it honestly tastes like a gourmet dish.

The carrots and potatoes give the vegan cheese sauce the great texture, the nutritional yeast adds  a cheesy flavor and the cashews make the sauce really rich and even more creamier.

BTW the baked tofu is great and fits not only to this dish, it goes also really well with any kind of Asian meals.
Much love
Maya💚
INGREDIENTS:
-200g potatoes, boiled
-200g carrots, boiled
-75g soaked cashews
-3 cloves garlic
-1 onion

-4 TBSP nutritional yeast, 1 Tsp salt, a pinch of black pepper, 1/4 Tsp turmeric, 1/4 tsp nutmeg

VEGANES MAC UND CHEESE🧀 Schaut euch diese cremige Sauce an!

Und wenn ich cremig sage, dann meine ich super super cremig, obwohl sie aus richtig einfachen Zutaten ist.

Die Kartoffeln und Karotten geben der Sauce eine gute Konsistenz, die Hefeflocken den Käsegeschmack und die Cashews machen es noch cremiger.

Übrigens dieser Tofu passt nicht nur gut zu diesem Essen, sondern auch zu allen möglichen asiatischen Gerichten.

-200g Karotten, gekocht

PREMIUM GRANOLA🥣 Crunchy, crunchier, premium granola!

This granola definitely deserved its name.
It's super crunchy a little bit nutty of the tahini, sweet and while eating there are these chewy date chunks.
In my opinion the perfect granola.

The buckwheat also adds an extra crunch and makes it even healthier bc the raw version is literally just the whole grain.
And the other ingredients are mostly health-promoting as well.

The premium granola is perfect to add a nice crunch to your yogurt bowl, smoothie bowl or eat it just by itself.
Much love
Maya💚
INGREDIENTS:
-6 TBSP Tahini
-3 TBSP coconut oil
-3 TBSP maple syrup
-270g raw buckwheat
-125g oats
-1/2 cup chopped dates, 1/4 cup coconut chips, 80g peanuts
-a pinch of salt, 1 TSP cinnamon

Try it yourself and tag me with #fitgreenrecipes 💚
-
PREMIUM KNUSPERMÜSLI🥣 Knusprig, knusprige, premium Knuspermüsli!

Dieses Müsli hat definitiv seinen Namen verdient.
Es ist super knusprig, leicht nussig durch das Tahini, süß und während man es isst beißt man immer wieder auf die weichen Dattelstücke.
Meiner Meinung nach das perfekte Granola!

Das Buchweizen gibt dem Ganzen noch einen extra Crunch und macht das Müsli sogar noch etwas gesünder, weil es ein reines Vollkorn ist.
Aber die anderen Zutaten sind auch ziemlich gesundheitsfördernd.

Das Müsli ist perfekt um deinen Joghurt-oder Smoothiebowls einen extra Crunch zugeben oder einfach so zu essen.
ZUTATEN:
-6 El Tahini
-3 El Kokosöl
-3 El Ahornsirup
-125g Haferflocken
-270g Buchweizen
-1/2 Tasse Datteln (geschnitten), 1/4 Tasse Kokoschips, 80g Erdnüsse
-eine Prise Salz, 1 TL Zimt

CHRISTMAS CHOCOLATE MOUSSE🍫🎅 Still searching a dessert for Christmas dinner?
If yes, gotcha!

This is probably the easiest and tastiest vegan dessert you can make on Christmas eve.
You don't need any fancy ingredients, just use the power of the chickpea water and create magic. 
And don't worry about getting the aquafaba stiff, you just gotta be a bit patient.
Depending on your hand mixer it takes about 5-7 minutes until it's stiff.

If you want to be extra special you can add apart from the melted chocolate a handful chocolate shavings.
They add a nice little crunch to the fluffy, rich mousse and it's simply the best combo you can imagine!
How do you celebrate Christmas? 🎄⛄

VEGAN RICOTTA🥯 What happens if you put cashews and tofu together?
Right, you get vegan ricotta!

Now you are maybe a little confused but those two are basically the main ingredients of this creamy spread.
It's perfect for a Christmas brunch or on a bagel with lox or on lasagna (probably my favorite variation). And it's literally that easy to make, just put everything in a blender and it'll do the rest.

So you don't have to buy that expensive vegan cream cheese/ricotta in the store, you can easily make it at home.
Then, it's even healthier and in my opinion also tastier.

CHICKPEA TIKKA MASALA🥡 Indian cuisine at its finest my friends.
Tikka Masala was always my number one when it  came to Indian (take away) food.
And trust me this tastes almost more original than the original!

I know that's a big statement but you gotta try before judging.
This sauce combines basically everything our brain likes, it's thick and creamy, kinda fruity but also spicy and chickpeas are just great in every dish.

So if you got Indian friends and you wanna impress them, serve this dish and they'll instantly love you, promise.
This chickpea Tikka Masala is now also on the top list of dishes my family cooks pretty frequently.

The magic behind the sauce is basically the roasting of the spices, garlic, onion and ginger and then blending it afterwards. 
So the it's really rich in flavor and simply the best.

It's also great for meal prep, you can cook it in bulk and freeze or refrigerate it until you wanna eat it. 
Do you do meal prep? 🍴👇

Aber sie sind einfach zu gut um sie nicht zu essen (der Geschmack ist mit Cookie Dough vergleichbar). Und trotzdem sind sie super gesund. 
Du kannst auch selbst verschiedene Versionen machen, zum Beispiel Erdnussmus anstatt Mandelmus, füge etwas Kakao hinzu, 
Schokostückchen, praktisch alles! 
Und glaub mir die schmecken nicht wie normale Proteinriegel.

In today's world its already possible to make a VEGAN omlette🤯 Which tastes amazing and very "eggy" bc of the Kala namak, it's an Indian black salt with an eggy flavor👌 You can combine it with a bunch of veggies or avocado or maybe even hummus🤔😋 Anyways, super easy to throw together and also filled with loads of nutrients bc chickpeas got many of them and chickpea flour is basically chickpeas, just blended up🙈 Wish y'all a great evening and keep up the positive vibes ✌💚If you try my recipes you can post them with the #fitgreenrecipes 😋💚

Verrückt. I've been recently experimenting with vital wheat gluten and found out that it's absolutely versatile bc you can use it in savory as well as in sweet dishes, for example in these super fluffy pancakes😍 And a pretty cool advantage of vital wheat gluten is that it's really high in protein (80g/100g) 👌 And you taste literally no difference to "normal" pancakes😜 So I highly recommend this one🙌 My day was pretty relaxed, I did my homework and was with my family on a walk before it started raining cats and dogs🙈 BTW its so crazy, now the sun is already going down at 5pm🤯 Wish y'all a great evening and keep up the positive vibes ✌💚If you try my recipes you can post them with the #fitgreenrecipes 😋💚

{Summer Roll Bowl/recipe below 🇩🇪🇺🇲}
Hey guys, hope you're doing well 🙈 I made this bowl this noon and I guess it's my fave now😂👌 Honestly tastes like a summer roll just better😋😎 Anyways since it's our last week of summer break I try to get as much out of my leisure time as possible 😁 So I did another workout, shoot g, editing and researching (yep, that's what I like to do in my leisure time😂🙈) No I'm making a really good vegan Bolognese for me and my family✌️😋 Wish y'all a great evening and keep up the positive vibes ✌️💚
RECIPE SUMMER ROLL BOWL:
-50g rice noodles
-100g tofu (+soy sauce, teriyaki sauce)
-edamame, shredded red cabbage, shredded carrots, cucumber

Peanut sauce:
-1 tsbp peanut butter, lime juice, chili, a bit soy sauce, pepper, water

First chop up all ingredients and fry the tofu on medium heat with the soy and teriyaki sauce. In the mean time prepare the peanut sauce and cook the noodles. Throw everything together and enjoy with a bit more lime juice😋💚 If you try my recipes you can post them with the #fitgreenrecipes 😊💚 Hey Leute🙈 Diese Bowl ist definitiv mein neuer Favorit, schmeckt wie Sommerrollen nur besser😂😋 Jedenfalls, weil nun meine letzte Ferienwoche angebrochen ist, versuche ich so viel wie möglich daraus zu machen😁 Das heißt ich habe heute wieder trainiert, Fotos gemacht, bearbeitet und so Zeugs (ja, das macht mir alles Spaß) 🙈 So wünsche euch noch einen schönen Abend und macht's gut✌️💚
REZEPT SOMMERROLLEN BOWL:
-50g Reisnudeln
-100g Tofu (+Soya sauce, Teriyaki sauce)
-Edamame, Karotte, Rotkohl, Gurke

Erdnusssosse:
-1 El Erdnussbutter, Limettensaft, Chili, etwas Soya sauce, Pfeffer, Wasser

Schneide zuerst das Gemüse und rate den Tofu auf mittlerer Hitze mit der Soya- und Teriyaki sauce. Mixe in der Zwischenzeit die Erdnusssosse zusammen und koche die Reisnudeln. Schmeiße alles in eine Schüssel und genieße es mit etwas mehr Limettensaft. Guten Appetit 😋💚 Falls du meine Rezepte ausprobierst kannst du sie mit dem #fitgreenrecipes posten 😊💚
